hedline.hl1: Police Say Mother Took Son to Attack Youth

abstract.p: Peggy Laureano and her 16-year-old son Joseph Galletti are arrested, Levittown, LI, after woman drove her son to park and encouraged him to assault another youth (S)

block.p: A mother and her 16-year-old son were arrested after the woman drove her son to a park and encouraged him to assault another youth, the Nassau County police said yesterday. The son slashed the other boy's neck with a razor blade, critically injuring him, the police said in a statement.

A mother and her 16-year-old son were arrested after the woman drove her son to a park and encouraged him to assault another youth, the Nassau County police said yesterday. The son slashed the other boy's neck with a razor blade, critically injuring him, the police said in a statement.
According to the police, the son, Joseph Galletti of Valley Road in Levittown had recently been in a fight with the other youth.

On Sunday night at 9 p.m., the police said, Mr. Galletti's mother, Peggy Laureano, 35, and a friend, Carlos Cabral, 42, drove Mr. Galletti to Azalea Avenue Park in Levittown, an area the 18-year-old victim was known to frequent.

As the adults looked on, Mr. Galletti slashed the other boy with a razor blade on the neck and back, the police said. The victim, whose name was not released, was in critical condition at Nassau County Medical Center yesterday morning. It was not possible to get an update on his condition last night.
Mr. Galletti was charged with assault, and his mother and Mr. Cabral were charged with endangering the welfare of a minor and criminal facilitiation, the police said.
